attributes.title: Footer
attributes.description: The Footer component helps help users find information at the bottom of a page.

attributes.title: On this page

attributes.markup:
Use footers to help users find what they need after scrolling to the bottom of a page. Footers provide supplementary information such as:

  • copyright,
  • contact information,
  • links to other pages within the website and
  • social media links.

The footer must be used at the bottom of every page. It is separate from the primary navigation but is relevant to the entire site.

Use the sfGpsDsAuVic2FooterComm component which appears as VIC2 DS Footer in the Experience Builder component list.

Configuration of the example

LWC configuration
Attribute Label Value
variant Variant default
mode Nav mode Experience Cloud Navigation
navigationDevName Nav navigation name "VIC2 Footer Nav Default BP Example"
credit Credit "Image credit: image metadata or credit goes here."
acknowledgement Acknowledgement "The Victorian Government acknowledges Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people as the Traditional Custodians of the land and acknowledges and pays respect to their Elders, past and present."
linksMode Links mode Experience Cloud Navigation
linksNavigationDevName Links navigation name "VIC2 Footer Links Default BP Example"
logos Logos [
{
"src": "data:image/svg+xml;charset=UTF-8,%3Csvg%20width%3D%22200%22%20height%3D%2280%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20viewBox%3D%220%200%20200%2080%22%20preserveAspectRatio%3D%22none%22%3E%0A%3Cdefs%3E%0A%3Cstyle%20type%3D%22text%2Fcss%22%3E%0A%23holder%20text%20%7B%0Afill%3A%20rgb(150%2C%20150%2C%20150)%3B%0Afont-family%3AArial%2Csans-serif%3B%0Afont-size%3A%2013.333333333333334px%3B%0Afont-weight%3A400%3B%0A%7D%0A%3C%2Fstyle%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%3Cg%20id%3D%22holder%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20width%3D%22100%25%22%20height%3D%22100%25%22%20fill%3D%22rgb(204%2C%20204%2C%20204)%22%3E%3C%2Frect%3E%0A%3Cg%3E%0A%3Ctext%20text-anchor%3D%22middle%22%20x%3D%2250%25%22%20y%3D%2250%25%22%20dy%3D%22.3em%22%3E200%20x%2080%3C%2Ftext%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A3C%2Fsvg%3E",
"alt": "Landscape",
"url": "#"
}
]

Configuration of the example

LWC configuration
Attribute Label Value
variant Variant neutral
mode Nav mode Experience Cloud Navigation
navigationDevName Nav navigation name "VIC2 Footer Nav Default BP Example"
credit Credit "Image credit: image metadata or credit goes here."
acknowledgement Acknowledgement "The Victorian Government acknowledges Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people as the Traditional Custodians of the land and acknowledges and pays respect to their Elders, past and present."
linksMode Links mode Experience Cloud Navigation
linksNavigationDevName Links navigation name "VIC2 Footer Links Default BP Example"

Documentation

LWC documentation
Attribute Label Description
variant Variant Colour scheme variant with a choice of default and neutral.
mode Nav mode Sets how details of the footer nav are read with a choice of Demo, Experience Cloud Navigation, Integration Procedure and Hide.
navigationDevName Nav navigation name Pick the target Experience Cloud navigation for the footer nav when mode is set to Experience Cloud Navigation.
ipName Nav integration procedure name Name of the IP to invoke for getting the footer nav when mode is set to Integration Procedure.
inputJSON Nav input JSON JSON formatted input parameters for the nav Integration Procedure.
optionsJSON Nav options JSON JSON formatted options for the nav Integration Procedure.
credit Credit Credit that goes at the bottom of the upper footer section.
acknowledgement Acknowledgement Text displayed as acknowlegement to country with a default as suggested by VIC SDP.
className Class name Additional CSS class to be applied.
linksMode Links mode Sets how details of the footer links are read with a choice of Demo, Experience Cloud Navigation, Integration Procedure and Hide.
linksNavigationDevName Links navigation name Pick the target Experience Cloud navigation for the footer links when linksMode is set to Experience Cloud Navigation.
linksIpName Links integration procedure name Name of the IP to invoke for getting the footer links when linksMode is set to Integration Procedure.
linksInputJSON Links input JSON JSON formatted input parameters for the links Integration Procedure.
linksOptionsJSON Links options JSON JSON formatted options for the links Integration Procedure.
logos Logos Additional footer logos as a JSON array of { src, alt, url }.
className Class name Additional CSS classes to be applied.
